Title: The Adversary
Writer: Frédéric Bélier-Garcia, Emmanuel Carrère (novel), Jacques Fieschi, Nicole Garcia
Actors: Daniel Auteuil, Géraldine Pailhas, François Cluzet, Emmanuelle Devos
Plot: When a man murders his wife, children and parents, the ensuing investigation reveals that he's been living a lie for almost 20 years.
